content: @double_whammied yay - thrilled for you. I started a new job last April: best thing I did. Tired & brainfoggy but def the best move #bcmets
@iswhiz eek - and I've not even sent playdates thro' yet :( #badme is it medication or a cranial nerve? #fucancer #bcmets
@laralalalara did my first half marathon in Sept 13. No breasts no recon - running so much easier ;) #bcmets
Waiting for CT scan at Guy's. first time using PowerPort for contrast dye. #alwayssomethingnew #bcmets #bcsm
RT @illingpig: Waiting for CT scan at Guy's. first time using PowerPort for contrast dye. #alwayssomethingnew #bcmets #bcsm
@AdamsLisa on open chemo ward at the moment. Mine and at least ten others beeping away #auditoryhell #bcmets
@stage4blog had a CT scan today to check progression. Bottle of champagne and half a pound of white chocolate later... #cancerstress #bcmets
@Bumpyboobs good luck with yours, had mine today. Now the wait for results begins :( #bcmets

company awayday on a boat - now have real sea (river) sickness to add to #bcmets anaemia vertigo and nausea from meds #triplewhammy :(
